name: 2024 the 8th International Conference on Virtual and Augmented Reality Simulations
content: Publication: Accepted and presented papers will be published in ICVARS 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). The ISBN number assigned to ICVARS 2024 is 979-8-4007-0901-2
